install.name: AcyMailing Tag : redSHOP Products
install.author: redCOMPONENT.com
install.description: This plugin enables you to add redSHOP Products in your Newsletter

field.name: myspacer
field.label:
Note: Available template tags for this plugin:

{product:N} This tag will show the product thumbnail, its name, and its price.
{product_thumb_image:N} This tag will show the product image.
{product_name:N} This tag will show the product name.
{product_price:N} This tag will show the product price.

Where N is the product ID in every tag.
No other tag will work with this plugin.

field.name: product_template
field.label: Product Template
field.description: Select Product Template from Product Content template section
field.query: SELECT template_id AS tm_value, template_name AS tm_title FROM #__redshop_template WHERE template_section='product_content_template'
